description: This Kotlin file defines a Fragment named MenuFragment for an Android food delivery app. It manages the UI for displaying a restaurant's menu, including handling category filtering via chips, integrating with repositories for cart and favorites management, and setting up RecyclerView with a custom adapter.

classes.name: MenuFragment
classes.description: An Android Fragment that displays a restaurant menu with filtering, favorites, and cart functionalities.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the menu adapter and sets up event handlers for cart and favorite repository updates.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the fragment's layout from XML.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Initializes UI components, sets restaurant info, assigns layout manager and adapter, and sets up category chips filtering.

methods.name: setupCategoryChips
methods.description: Creates category filter chips dynamically based on available categories and sets filter actions.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.description: Factory method to create a new instance of MenuFragment with a specified restaurant ID.
